experience: You and Zach both know Matthew Giacomazzo and Michael Ashbaugh
Solution Consulting Manager supporting NetSuite's account management organization, focused on the Wholesale Distribution and Manufacturing industry verticals.

Provide national presales support for the Wholesale Distribution and Manufacturing industries within the NetSuite Account Management Organization, focusing on NetSuite’s portfolio of cloud ERP applicationsWork directly with the NetSuite install base to drive reoccurring revenue opportunities and ensure subscription renewals through customer satisfaction and application adoptionResponsible for composing and delivering customer specific demonstrations in a simplistic fashion that drives NetSuite’s differentiators Conduct customer facing discovery sessions, gather customer requirements, respond to RFP’s, engage in demand generation activities, and collaborate with sales teams to drive revenue and pipeline growth Actively involved in the training and mentoring of incoming and current Solution ConsultantsBuild reusable assets for the Solution Consulting community including recordings, best practices documents, demo scripts, customer facing powerpoints, and training guides

Provided national presales support for the Procurement line of business, focusing on Ariba and SAP’s joint portfolio of OnPremise and OnDemand solutions that encompass the “Source to Settle” business processComposed and delivered customer specific presentations in a simplistic fashion that drove SAP/Ariba differentiators Conducted customer facing discovery sessions, responded to RFP’s, engaged in demand generation, compiled business cases,  participated in design thinking sessions, and collaborated with sales teams to drive revenue Lead Solution Consultant of multiple sales cyclesTrained incoming and current Solution Engineers on SAP and Ariba procurement solutionsDrove innovative and simplistic demonstrations across the LOB

Engaged customers through value orientated virtual demonstrations in a volume centric modelWorked directly with SAP Inside Sales Representatives to achieve quota targetsDrove innovation in LOB through educational blog series, creation of demo scripts, presentation assets,  demonstration videos, and marketing materials

SAP Presales Graduate Academy (PGA)Participated in the inaugural class of the Presales Graduate Academy; a high-touch immersion program consisting of both traditional classroom and hands-on learningFocused on fundamentals of value-based selling, presentation capabilities and styles, preparation and review of business cases, and deep knowledge of SAP solutionsExpanded skills in business acumen, effective teamwork, and executive level communicationGained ERP, Demo2Win, Question2Win, Design Thinking, industry, and solution specific certifications
Founder: Phi Beta Lambda Business Fraternity
Positions: External Vice President, Executive Board Member, New Member Educator, Parliamentarian

Minor: Supply Chain Management and Information SystemsAwards and Honors: Graduated with High Distinction.Beta Gamma Sigma - International Honor SocietyActive member, recognized as being in the top ten percent of junior classPhi Beta Lambda State Leadership Conference, 2008 and 2009Placed 1st in state, Management ConceptsPlaced 2nd  in state, Management Analysis and Decision MakingPlaced 3rd in state, Information ManagementPhi Beta Lambda National Leadership Conference 2008 – Atlanta, GeorgiaPlaced 10th in nation, Management Analysis and Decision Making
Participated in a yearlong mentoring program that helped TFA graduates refine their resumes, prepare for  employer interviews, and provided guidance on possible career paths

Customer Engagement Director at SAP Ariba
April 9, 2015, William managed Zach directly

I had the pleasure of working with Zach for almost two years, first at part of NA Procurement Presales team at SAP, as well as part of a team that transitioned to Ariba, following SAP's acquisition.  Zach was faced with a tremendous amount of change, though out the two years, and successfully faced every challenge head on, with a fantastic attitude.  I would not hesitate to say that he has set the bar for anyone coming out of SAP's Presales Graduate Academy.

Alan Martin
Senior Business Development Executive at Iron Mountain
March 17, 2015, Zach worked with Alan in the same group

It is my pleasure to write a personal recommendation on behalf of Zach Tullis.  Zach's solid discovery and listening skills enable him to gain a firm understanding of his client's current business state and objectives for improvement.  He consistently exhibits a consultative, challenger-based approach to tailor, recommend and demonstrate the right solution to ensure future state objectives and corresponding ROI are successfully achieved.  Zach is a valued team player on whom his colleagues and clients highly depend given his deep product and industry knowledge.  He is well liked and respected by all, and carries himself with utmost integrity and character.  Any organization would be well served to have a Solutions Consultant of Zach's caliber on their team!

Director, SAP Digital Business Services
March 13, 2015, Craig worked with Zach in different groups

Polished, meticulous, and driven are just a few of the qualities that come to mind when I think about Zach.    As an Account Executive at SAP/Ariba, I worked closely with Zach, who supported me as a Solution Consultant,  on many client engagements.    As any successful Account Executive will attest, having a truly talented Solution Consultant supporting you in the field  can make all the difference.    Fortunately, for me, Zach was one of those talented Solution Consultants.   Above all,  I was impressed by Zach’s  innate ability to  quickly connect  and establish rapport with customers.  Not only  on a  professional level, but a personal level as well.   Zach is a true asset in the field and comes with my highest recommendation.

SAP Presales Academy Director at SAP
October 16, 2012, Randy managed Zach directly

Zach worked for me in 2011 as he transitioned from a presales development program into Solution Engineering.  Zach brought a sense of passion and energy to the job that was contagious.  He accepted every new challenge I presented him with a high level of determination and enthusiasm.While Zach has since moved to a Field Presales role back near his family on the east coast, I would welcome him back to my inside presales team in a heartbeat.  I expect Zach to have a stellar presales career at SAP.  He is what I call "a natural", someone who learns quickly, connects with his clients, and communicates complex solutions in a simple to understand fashion.

summary: NetSuite is the world's leading provider of cloud-based business management software. NetSuite helps companies manage core business processes with a single, fully integrated system covering ERP/financials, CRM, ecommerce, inventory and more.
